patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 4 months.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: Depends on your course . Each class will be of 50 minutes.
There are assignments which carry more weight than your written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 7:00 am to 8:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.

patterns: how much is the college fee
responses: Specify your course

MCA:
 
Nationality

The applicant for admission should be a Resident Indian National and should have graduated from Institutions located in India. 
Foreign and NRI/ PIO applications are to be made separately. Please visit the International Relations tab in VIT website.

Eligibility Criteria

    Candidates should have graduated with a full-time degree from any recognized University/Institute with a minimum aggregate of 60% or First class for MCA degree programme.
    Consistent Record in X and XII Std is required.
    Candidates appearing for their final degree exam / final semester exam in the current year are also eligible to apply.
    Candidates should have completed their final Semester/year exams before the selection counselling at VIT

The CDC centre plays an integral role in creating the illustrious placement record of VIT. 
It ensures smooth functioning of the placement activities in the campus. 
The centre further facilitates training activities of the students and makes sure they get placed in the best of both national and international companies.

Company CTC 
Microsoft 44,00,000 
AppDynamics 39,20,000 
D.E.SHAW 35,25,000 
UDAAN 35,00,000 
WorkIndia 35,00,000 
Cloudera 31,33,000 
Amazon 29,50,000 
Motorq 26,00,000 
Morgan Stanley 25,30,000 
PayPal 23,80,000 
WellsFargoEGS India 20,00,000

Microsoft - 7 offers

Wipro Technologies (Wipro Turbo) made job offers to 278 students with a CTC (cost to company) of 6.50 lakhs per annum from the 2020 graduating batch of Vellore Institute of Technology during the campus recruitment drive held at the VIT campus. This is the highest number of dream offers given by the company to the students from a single institution, and has found a place in the Limca Book of Records in its 2020 edition (9th Time).

This surpasses the earlier record of 238 dream offers made by the same company to the 2019 graduating batch of VIT. This is also the 8th time that the VIT is entering the Limca Book of Records for campus placements. Earlier, VIT has entered into the Limca Book of records in 2009, 2011, 2014, 2015 (two records), in 2016 for the highest number of IT services placements, in 2017 and 2018 for the highest number of dream offers.

MBA:
eligibility criteria:
A minimum of 60% mark or First class is required in any Under Graduate or Integrated degree from a recognized University or Institution.
    The qualification criteria is relaxed by 10% in UG degree for applicants belonging to SC / ST and applicants hailing from Jammu & Kashmir, Ladakh and the North Eastern states of Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Manipur , Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Sikkim and Tripura.
    A Bachelor’s degree should be of a minimum of three years duration after completion of higher secondary education (10+2) or equivalent.
    The candidate should have studied in regular full-time programmes. Applicants from Open University / Distance mode / Correspondence mode are not eligible to apply.
    The candidates appearing for final year examination in 2022, whose results will be published before 15th, August 2022, are also eligible to apply.
    Selection will be based on best score secured in VITBEE-2022 or valid Aptitude test score of CAT / XAT / MAT / NMAT / GMAT / CMAT / ATMA.
    The candidates who have appeared or to be appearing CAT / XAT / MAT / NMAT / GMAT / CMAT / ATMA can also apply.

FEES:

Particulars
				Tuition Fees 	Caution Deposit 	Total Fees
MBA (First year) 	348,500.00 	3,000.00 	 351,500.00
MBA (Second year) 	348,500.00 	- 			348,500.00

Nationality

The applicant for admission should be a Resident Indian National and should have graduated from Institutions located in India. 
Foreign and NRI/ PIO applications are to be made separately. Please visit the International Relations tab in VIT website.

Eligibility Criteria

    Candidates should have graduated with a full-time degree from any recognized University/Institute with a minimum aggregate of 60% or First class for MCA degree programme.
    Consistent Record in X and XII Std is required.
    Candidates appearing for their final degree exam / final semester exam in the current year are also eligible to apply.
    Candidates should have completed their final Semester/year exams before the selection counselling at VIT

M.SC.:
PROGRAM OFFERED:

M.Sc. Applied Microbiology 
M.Sc. Biomedical Genetics 
M.Sc. Biotechnology 
M.Sc. Business Statistics
M.Sc. Data Science 
M.Sc. Chemistry 
M.Sc. Physics  	

ELIGIBILITY:



(a) Candidates will be shortlisted for admission in the order of merit of their aggregate marks secured in their undergraduate degree programmes calculated upto pre-final year / semester or final year / semester. This is inclusive of Languages / EOP and all the subjects they have studied upto pre-final year.

(b) Course-wise Eligibility
School 	PROGRAMME 	ELIGIBILITY
SBST 	M.Sc.Applied Microbiology 	B.Sc.degree from a recognized university in any branch of Biological Science that includes Botany / Zoology, Microbiology / Biochemistry/Biotechnology / Nutrition (or) Home Science / Agricultural Science /Medicine with an 60% of marks (Inclusive of all subjects)
M.Sc. Biomedical Genetics (Optional specialization in Genetic Counseling)
M.Sc.Biotechnology
SAS 	M.Sc. Business Statistics 	Under graduation in Mathematics/Statistics/Computer Science/Business/Commerce/ Economics/Engineering with 60% marks(Inclusive of all subjects) and should have studied Mathematics asone of the subject in +2and degree level.
M.Sc. Data Science 	Under graduation in Mathematics/Computer Science/ Physics/ Statistics or UG Degree in Engineering or Technology in CSE/IT/ECE/EEE/E&I with an 60% of marks (Inclusive of all subjects).
M.Sc.Chemistry (with specialization in Analytical or Inorganic or Organic or General Chemistry or Pharmaceutical Chemistry) 	B.Sc.degree in either Chemistry or Applied Chemistry or Applied Science from any recognized university with Physics or Mathematics / B.Pharm (or) Biology/ Botany/Zoology as ancillary subjects with an 60%of marks (Inclusive of all subjects)
M.Sc.Physics 	B.Sc.degree from any recognized university with Physics / Applied Sciences with an 60% of marks (Inclusive of all subjects)

For MSC (2 years) Programmes : The aggregate marks obtained in the subjects in UG Degree Programme should be 50% for the following categories: 
 

    Applicants belonging to SC/ST category should submit community certificate
    Applicants hailing from Jammu & Kashmir, Ladakh and the North Eastern states of Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Sikkim and Tripura. They should submit Nativity Certificate
    Applicants from Correspondence / Open University mode are not eligible
